description: Jack Ma, Alibaba’s billionaire co-founder, returned to mainland China after spending roughly a year overseas, according to people familiar with the matter.

title: Lyft, grappling with competition and a battered stock price, tapped a board member as its chief executive, and its two co-founders will step back from management.
description: Lyft, grappling with competition and a battered stock price, tapped a board member as its chief executive, and its two co-founders will step back from management.

title: SVB's failure demonstrates a "textbook case of mismanagement," the Fed's Barr was expected to tell Senate lawmakers Tuesday, while acknowledging there may have been shortcomings in the central bank's oversight.
description: SVB’s failure demonstrates a “textbook case of mismanagement,” the Fed’s Barr was expected to tell Senate lawmakers Tuesday, while acknowledging there may have been shortcomings in the central bank’s oversight.

title: The CFTC sued Binance, alleging the operator of the world's largest crypto exchange kept an illegal foothold in the U.S. market and violated rules designed to prevent illicit financial activity.
description: The CFTC sued Binance, alleging the operator of the world’s largest crypto exchange kept an illegal foothold in the U.S. market and violated rules designed to prevent illicit financial activity.

title: The Dow rose 0.6% as concerns about the health of the banking sector ebbed. The S&P 500 gained 0.2% and the Nasdaq fell 0.5%.
description: The Dow rose 0.6% as concerns about the health of the banking sector ebbed. The S&P 500 gained 0.2% and the Nasdaq fell 0.5%.

title: Disney Eliminates Its Metaverse Division as Part of Layoffs Plan
description: The unit, once seen as developing a new form of storytelling, had about 50 employees.

title: U.S., Japan Strike Deal on Minerals Used in Batteries for Electric Cars
description: The move aims to address two of the Biden administration’s problems: its restrictions on EV subsidies and China’s supply-chain dominance.
